p: The deposition of graphene onto the surface of a tapered POF allowed the measurement of uric acid concentration with a sensitivity of 0.0021 mV/ppm in a range of concentrations between 0 and 500 ppm [ 136]. However, it should be noted that the device operated as a refractometer, based on the RI change of the solution at the change of the uric acid and the authors did not conduct any selectivity tests.
